ComicInfo.Summary:
Holmes inches closer to solving the disappearance of Michael Williams, but it also brings him closer to danger! Meanwhile, Moriarty’s cunning scheme goes deeper than anyone anticipated, including the neighborhood boy caught in his clutches!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | John Cassaday (a) & José Villarrubia (c) | 1 | B/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | John Cassaday (a) & José Villarrubia (c) | 2 | C/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | John Cassaday | 3 |
